original_title: Lebensläufe - Die Geschichte der Kinder von Golzow in einzelnen Portraits
overview: A sequence of nine individual biographical sketches with a prologue and epilogue on Golzow and the long-term observation. Deepening of the preceding chronicle. The Golzow people in the present, from which retrospective views of the previous life and the life conflicts of the individual are given.
title: Lebensläufe - Die Geschichte der Kinder von Golzow in einzelnen Portraits
